author: iSazonov
body:
Daily build failed: https://ci.appveyor.com/project/PowerShell/powershell-f975h

Issue description
---
We dynamically build and load a module with test 'wrong' cmdlets to test C# implementation of a valid values generator.
Later Get-Help tests catches the test 'wrong' cmdlets and throws.

Fix
---
Unload the test module.

/cc @daxian-dbw

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Wait, we still need `Remove-Module -ModuleInfo $testModule` in the `AfterAll` block, right?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
:-) Ah, sorry - I removed the main fix.

Fixed.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Sign .. 😄 I already added it, now there are 2 `AfterAll` blocks

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: I will clean it up, just to let you know so that we don't conflict again.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @iSazonov can you please take a look at Gitter? I left a message for you.

title: Fix C# tests for ValidateSetValuesGenerator
